title: Community-Centered Instructional Design for Online Health Science Course Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in health sciences and experience in online education development
context.additional_context: Capacity-building education for online health science course development targeting current practitioners, emphasizing community-centered collaboration and practical tool utilization

learning_goals: Learners can complete one online health science module within three months by applying a community-centered framework.
Learners can design and implement effective communication protocols within a development team.
Learners can reduce project delays by 20% by establishing realistic timelines and role allocation plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
